title: Google Maps Advanced Search
description: Search businesses with precise location boundaries using coordinates and zoom level.

zoom.title: Zoom Level
zoom.description: Map zoom level for precision (3=broad overview, 21=street level)

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Center latitude for search (optional, auto-resolved from query if blank)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Center longitude for search (optional, auto-resolved from query if blank)

limit.title: Result Limit
limit.description: Maximum results to return (1 or more)

hl.title: Language (HL)
hl.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'es', 'fr' or with region 'en-US', 'de-DE')

gl.title: Region (GL)
gl.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for region-specific results (e.g., 'us', 'de', 'fr', 'uk')
